title: LF People in Silver 3 - Plat 5 ( 8 players and no support mains sorry)
body:
Hello Summoners, Have you been looking for a silver team? One that are on regularly; Dont flame; Get along well; Are competitive??? Well look no further because the Silver Legends is for you. I am looking for 8 players although i have 2-3 friends that will most likely join. I havent enjoyed ranked much but are starting to like it. I am climbing quickly on both of my accounts: Frost09 and Jzzz monster. My ADC and my support account although i like support better. Fill in these requirements and we talk further once I add you.

IGN: 
Age:
Pool (No more than 6):
Roles (No more than 2):
Skype:
Availability:
Division:
Goal Division:
Out of 10 how competitive are you?:

replies.body:
IGN: Spaghini
Age: 18
Pool (No more than 6): Riven, Shen, Maokai, Trundle, Zed
Roles (No more than 2): Top (main), Mid
Skype: Sadly not
Availability: Pretty often, mainly evenings
Division: S3 (was G5 when i played more often)
Goal Division: G5
Out of 10 how competitive are you?: 10 in ranked 5s ^_^

IGN: NRG Nemesis
Age: 16
Pool (No more than 6): {{champion:18}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:67}} 
Roles (No more than 2): ADC (Main), Jungle
Skype: Skype, TS, Curse etc.
Availability: Everyday, sometimes might be doing things that aren't planned
Division: Gold 3
Goal Division: Plat
Out of 10 how competitive are you?: 9/10

IGN: PervySage79
Age: 35 (Yes I'm old)
Pool (No more than 6): pool?
Roles (No more than 2): Mid (main) / Support
Skype: Curse Voice... Skype isn't secure
Availability: most days except weekends.
Division: Silver 3 (skipped two ranks in a row)
Goal Division: Gold+
Out of 10 how competitive are you?: 8/10
